query:
SELECT 
  avt.id,
  avt.task_id,
  avt.highlight_id,
  avt.status,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.kling_task_id,
  avt.video_url,
  avt.created_at,
  avt.updated_at,
  ph.audio_url,
  ph.duration,
  pt.youtube_url,
  pt.title as task_title
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
LEFT JOIN podcast_tasks pt ON avt.task_id = pt.id
WHERE avt.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE)
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;
command:

  avt.task_id,
  avt.highlight_id,
  avt.status,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.kling_task_id,
  avt.video_url,
  avt.created_at,
  avt.updated_at,
  ph.audio_url,
  ph.duration,
  pt.youtube_url,
  pt.title as task_title
FROM avatar_video_tasks avt
LEFT JOIN podcast_highlights ph ON avt.highlight_id = ph.id
LEFT JOIN podcast_tasks pt ON avt.task_id = pt.id
WHERE avt.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE)
ORDER BY avt.created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;
